rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. No digit can appear in the same cell position in different 2x3 outlined boxes.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. No digit can appear in the same cell position in different 3x3 outlined boxes.
